segments.text: From the looks of this house from the outside , I don ’ t really think that I want to go inside .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: From here , it does look like it could use a little work . Let ’ s see what the interior looks like .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I am not impressed by the interior of this house .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sometimes all a place needs is a little bit of cleaning and some fresh paint .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: With so few windows , how can you even see what the problems are ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think that we should check out the kitchen . It is listed as roomy and spacious .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Where are you supposed to store things without any cabinet space ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The picture in the listing shows a lovely master suite . I think that we should go look at it since we are here .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Is there a dead animal somewhere in here ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I think that it is pretty safe to say that this is not the house for you .
segments.speaker: S2
